title: Image
description: An image from a content item

uid.description: The unique identifier of the image

issueUid.description: The unique identifier of the issue that the image belongs to.

contentItemUid.description: The unique identifier of the content item that the image belongs to.

previewUrl.description: The URL of the image preview

pageNumbers.description: The page numbers of the issue that the image belongs to.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the media source

name.description: The name of the media source

type.description: The type of the media source

mediaSourceRef.description: The media source of the image

visualContent.description: Whether the content is an image or not.

technique.description: Determines if the image is a photograph.

communicationGoal.description: Purpose or communicative function of the image.

date.description: The date of the image or the date of the issue that the image belongs to.

embeddings.description: Precomputed embeddings for the image in the format: <model_type>:<base64_embedding_vector>.
